title: Will Snapchat’s ‘Cosmo After Dark’ Channel Show Pornography to Children?
subtitle: "Cosmo After Dark" will feature content about sex, but this Snapchat channel isn't porn and will only be available to viewers 18 and older.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The Snapchat channel "Cosmo After Dark" features pornography and will be shown to children as young as 13.
